themes: grant application process prioritizes form over substance
lack of genuine interest from decision makers
key_phrases: the only thing that matters is being smart about how you answer the questions
actual outcome desired by the grant writer is not considered
decision makers not having a deep interest in the outcomes
barriers_identified: grant application process rewards strategic answering over substance
access to insider information creates inequity
decision makers lack investment in project outcomes
focus on procedural compliance rather than impact
